front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Optical Port Communication Protocol to Complement the Utility Industry End Device Data Tables
front.abstract: This standard provides multi-source and "plug and play" environment for the millions of metering devices in the field now and the future using the ANSI Type optical port interface. It solves the problems associated with single source systems and with multi-source systems based upon proprietary communications protocols. Electric, Water, and Gas Utilities and corresponding vendors can realize cost savings which ultimately shall benefit the client consumers of the Utilities.
